resources.string: Are you sure you want to delete this account? This action cannot be undone. You may loose access to your account if you don\'t have a backup of your codes.
Use your biometric credential or your screen unlock method to access the app
Please make sure to check the imported accounts for correctness after the import with your old app.
The following accounts were found in the provided QR code. You can import them into the app.

The developers and distributors of this application are not responsible for any loss, damage, or access issues resulting from its use, including but not limited to incorrect OTP generation, account lockouts, or data corruption. This app is provided “as is” without any warranties or guarantees. By using it, you acknowledge that responsibility for correct setup, time accuracy, and secure key storage rests solely with you.

This application generates one-time passwords (OTPs) locally on your device to assist with secure authentication. It operates entirely offline, and no data, keys, or account information ever leaves your device. While the app is designed for accuracy and reliability, issues such as incorrect time settings, hardware faults, or configuration errors may cause invalid or expired codes to appear. Users should verify authentication data through official or backup methods when possible.
No data ever leaves this app.
Apply colors from wallpapers to the app theme
Require authentication when opening the app
